title: 3.2 Save Checkpoints - Implement checkpoint persistence
description: After each turn, save checkpoint to file. File naming: sessions/[session-id]/turn-[n].json. Include all state needed to resume.

title: 1.3 Player Agent Factory - Build dynamic agent generator
description: Create function that takes archetype + story context and generates PlayerAgent. Dynamic name generation, backstory generation, system prompt composition. Returns fully configured agent ready to respond.

title: 1.1 Project Setup - Create test harness package structure
description: Create new package in monorepo, set up TypeScript, AI SDK v5, configure environment for multiple model providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, Grok, DeepSeek, Kimi), create folder structure

title: 5.3 Multiple Player Models - Support all player agent models
description: Ensure Grok, Qwen, DeepSeek, Kimi K2 all work as player agents. Map archetypes to models correctly.

title: 1.4 Spokesperson Agent - Create synthesis agent
description: Create spokesperson agent that synthesizes multiple player responses. Takes array of player responses + spokesperson's archetype. Outputs single coherent relay to narrator. Adds realistic noise based on spokesperson personality.

title: 3.1 Checkpoint Schema - Define checkpoint data structure
description: Define Checkpoint interface (conversation history, agent states, session config, detected events). Serializable to JSON.

title: 5.5 End-to-End Test - Validate complete system
description: Run 5 sessions with different configs. Verify: sessions complete, reports generate, checkpoints save, replay works. Review reports manually for sanity.

title: 3.3 Load & Replay - Implement checkpoint loading and replay
description: Function to load checkpoint from file. Function to resume session from checkpoint with optionally modified config. Allow changing: system prompt, story guide, narrator model. Keep: conversation history, player agents, group composition.

title: 2.2 Output Classification - Classify narrator output types
description: Function to classify narrator output: pulse, tangent-response, private-moment, clarification, recap. Use cheap model (GPT-4o-mini) for classification. Return classification + confidence.

title: 2.1 Session Runner - Main orchestration loop
description: Main session orchestration. Initialize narrator with config, generate random group (2-5 players), select spokesperson, run character creation, main loop (narrator→classify→route→collect→synthesize→repeat), detect session end.

title: 2.3 Private Moment Detection & Routing - Handle individual player interactions
description: Detect when narrator addresses individual player. Route to correct player agent (bypass spokesperson). Collect individual response. Return to main flow.

title: 4.1 Issue Detection - Detect narrative problems
description: Detect contradictions, loops, forced segues, stuck moments. Return list of Issue objects with turn, type, description, severity.

title: 5.4 Error Handling - Add robust error handling
description: Handle API failures gracefully. Retry logic for transient errors. Save checkpoint before crash if possible. Clear error messages in report.

title: 4.2 Timeline Generation - Build session timeline
description: Process full transcript into timeline entries. Group by: character creation, pulses, tangents, recoveries, private moments, issues. Each entry has turn, type, title, content, notes.

title: 5.1 Cost Tracking - Track API costs
description: Track tokens used per agent per turn. Calculate cost based on model pricing. Include in session report.

title: 4.4 CLI for Running Sessions - Build run command
description: Command: pnpm test:run --story [story-id] --prompt [prompt-name] --narrator [model]. Runs full session. Outputs checkpoints + report. Prints summary to console.

title: 1.2 Define Archetypes - Create archetype definitions
description: Create archetypes.ts with all 10 archetype definitions (Joker, Engaged, Questioner, Wildcard, Follower, Curious, Optimizer, Invested, Drifter, Experienced). Each includes id, name, style, context, patterns, quirkFrequency, model assignment. Export as typed constant.

title: 5.2 Multiple Narrator Models - Support all narrator models
description: Ensure Opus 4.5, Grok 4, DeepSeek R2 all work as narrators. Handle different API patterns/auth.

title: 4.3 Session Report Generator - Generate markdown reports
description: Take completed session data. Generate formatted markdown report. Sections: Config, Group, Summary, Timeline, Issues, Full Transcript. Write to sessions/[session-id]/report.md.

title: 2.4 Turn Execution - Single turn logic
description: Single turn logic extracted as reusable function. Narrator generates→classify→route→agents respond→spokesperson synthesizes→return. Each turn returns all data needed for checkpoint.

title: 3.4 CLI for Replay - Build replay command
description: Command: pnpm test:replay --checkpoint [path] --prompt [new-prompt-name]. Loads checkpoint, applies new config, continues session. Outputs new session with branched ID.
